Articles.Content: There is a plugin or mod or something that tells you your true altitude up in the right corner of your screen, and for the life of me I can\'t find it. Does anyone know what it is called?

MechJeb has an Orbital and Surface display panel.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
No, the one I am thinking of is just two lines of numbers in the upper right corner, I love mechjeb, but if it\'s on my rocket I will use it. . . not very condusive to improving piloting skills.

I think that\'s Tosh\'s FPS Pod, but it needs you to make your own part. I think it\'s just download the plugin, and rename the mk1 pod\'s cfg to FPS pod.

Back it up!
